info.title: Doorrite API
info.description: All API endpoints for the Doorrite food delivery system.

post.description: Register a new user account
Send a one-time password to the user
Verify the one-time password
Authenticate and receive a JWT
Obtain a new JWT using a refresh token

get.description: Log out the currently authenticated user

post.description: Initiate the password reset process
Reset the user password with a valid token
Register a new vendor account
Send a one-time password to the vendor
Verify the one-time password for the vendor
Authenticate and receive a JWT for the vendor
Obtain a new JWT for the vendor using a refresh token

get.description: Log out the currently authenticated vendor

post.description: Initiate the password reset process for the vendor
Reset the vendor password with a valid token
Register a new rider account
Send a one-time password to the rider
Verify the one-time password for the rider
Authenticate and receive a JWT for the rider
Obtain a new JWT for the rider using a refresh token

get.description: Log out the currently authenticated rider

post.description: Initiate the password reset process for the rider
Reset the rider password with a valid token

get.description: Retrieve a list of available vendor categories and their keys.
Retrieves a user by their ID.
Retrieves the profile of the currently authenticated user.

put.description: Updates the profile of the currently authenticated user.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of orders for the currently authenticated user.
Fetches a single vendor by their ID.
Fetches the profile of the currently authenticated vendor, including their products and orders.

put.description: Updates the profile of the currently authenticated vendor.

get.description: Fetches a paginated list of products for the currently authenticated vendor.

post.description: Creates a new product for the authenticated vendor.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Required product data, including name, description, and base price.

description.example: Base price of the product (required, positive number).
A dictionary of custom product attributes.

put.description: Updates an existing product for the authenticated vendor.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Product fields to update. At least one field is required.

description.example: A dictionary of custom product attributes.

delete.description: Deletes a product for the authenticated vendor. Fails if the product has been ordered.
Deletes a specific product variant. Fails if the variant has been ordered.

get.description: Fetches a paginated list of orders for the currently authenticated vendor.

get.summary: Get a single order for the vendor
get.description: Fetches details of a specific order belonging to the currently authenticated vendor.

post.summary: Confirm if the Rider is Legit
post.description: Confirms the order rider by verifying code.'   *

patch.description: Updates the status of an order. Vendors can only set status to ACCEPTED, PREPARING, or CANCELLED.

get.description: Fetches a paginated list of all vendors.
Get all orders

post.description: Create a new order

get.description: Get a single order by its ID

post.description: Creates a payment intent for an order.
Confirms a payment using the payment reference.
Processes a refund for an order. Only admins can perform this action.

get.description: Checks the payment status for an order.

post.description: Authenticate an admin user.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all vendors.
Retrieves the details of a single vendor by their ID.

patch.description: Approves a vendor, making them verified and active.

delete.description: Deletes a Vendor, making them unavailable.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all riders.
Retrieves the details of a single rider by their ID.

patch.description: Approves a rider, making them verified and available.
Suspends a rider, making them unavailable.

delete.description: Deletes a rider, making them unavailable.
Deletes a User, making them unavailable.

patch.description: Updates the status of a specific order.

get.description: Retrieves various system reports, such as counts and revenue.

get.summary: Get a single rider by ID
get.description: Retrieves public information about a specific rider.
Retrieves the profile of the currently authenticated rider.

put.description: Updates the profile of the currently authenticated rider.

get.description: Retrieves a list of orders for the rider. Can be filtered by status or to show claimable orders.

parameters.name: claimable
parameters.description: Set to true to get claimable orders

post.description: Allows a rider to claim an available order for delivery.

get.summary: Get a specific order by ID
get.description: Retrieves details of a specific order assigned to the rider.

get.summary: Generate 6 digit code for order confirmation
get.description: Used for Verifying if the rider is the actual rider.

post.description: Allows a rider to decline an assigned order.

patch.description: Sets the rider as available or unavailable for new orders.

get.description: Retrieves the delivery history for the authenticated rider.
Retrieves a paginated list of all riders.

BearerAuth.description: Enter the JWT token prefixed with 'Bearer ' (e.g., 'Bearer abc.xyz.123').
